GE07bhg4c14u:1: śrī-bhagavān uvāca paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam |
GE07bhg4c14u:2: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c14u:7: kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogāt tad viddhi bharatarṣabha || ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c14u:8: sa ca kṣetra-kṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogo nirīśvara-sāṅkhyānām iva na svātantryeṇa |
GE07bhg4c14u:11: prapañcayiṣyan evambhūtaṃ vakṣyamānam arthaṃ stauti bhagavān paraṃ bhūya iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:14: taj jñānaṃ bhūyo 'pi tubhyaṃ prakarṣeṇa vakṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c14u:19: tad evāha yaj jñātvā munayo manana-śīlāḥ sarve |
GE07bhg4c14u:23: madhusūdanaḥ : pūrvādhyāye - yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃcit sattvaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:25: kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogāt tad viddhi [Gītā 13.26] ity uktaṃ tatra nirīśvara-sāṅkhyam atinirākaraṇena
GE07bhg4c14u:27: evaṃ kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu ity uktaṃ tatra kasmin guṇa kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:28: saṅgaḥ ke vā guṇāḥ kathaṃ vā te badhnantīti vaktavyam |
GE07bhg4c14u:30: bhūta-prakṛti-mokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param ity uktaṃ tatra
GE07bhg4c14u:31: bhūta-prakṛti-śabditebhyo guṇebhyaḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ syān muktasya ca kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti vaktavyaṃ, tad etat sarvaṃ vistareṇa vaktuṃ caturdaśo 'dhyāya
GE07bhg4c14u:33: tatra vakṣyamāṇam arthaṃ dvābhyāṃ stuvan śrotṝṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:37: kīdṛśaṃ tat ? jñānānāṃ jñāna-sādhanānāṃ bahiraṅgāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ madhya uttamam
GE07bhg4c14u:43: īdṛśaṃ jñānam ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ punaḥ pūrveṣv adhyāyeṣv asakṛd uktam api yaj jñānaṃ jñātvānuṣṭhāya munayo
GE07bhg4c14u:44: manana-śīlāḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhiṃ mokṣākhyām ito deha-bandhanād
GE07bhg4c14u:47: guṇāḥ syur bandhakās te tu phalair jñeyāś caturdaśe |
GE07bhg4c14u:48: guṇātyaye ciha-tatir hetur bhaktiś ca varṇitā ||
GE07bhg4c14u:49: pūrvādhyāye kāraṇaṃ guṇa-saṅgo 'sya sad-asad-yoni-janmasu ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c14u:50: tatra ke guṇāḥ, kīdṛśo guṇa-saṅgaḥ, kasya guṇasya saṅgāt kiṃ phalaṃ syāt,
GE07bhg4c14u:52: kathaṃ vā guṇebhyo mocanam ity apekṣāyāṃ vakṣyamānam arthaṃ stuvāno vaktuṃ pratijānīte param iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:56: guṇāḥ syur bandhakās te tu pariceyāḥ phalais trayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:57: mad-bhaktyā tan-nivṛttiḥ syād iti proktaṃ caturdaśe ||
GE07bhg4c14u:58: pūrvādhyāye mithaḥ-sampṛktānāṃ prakṛti-jīveśvarāṇāṃ svarūpāṇi vivicya jānann amānitvādi-dharmair viśiṣṭaḥB prakṛti-bandhād vimucyate
GE07bhg4c14u:60: tatra ke guṇāḥ, kasmin guṇe kathaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:61: saṅgaḥ, kasya guṇasya saṅgāt kiṃ phalaṃ, guṇa-saṅginaḥ kiṃvā lakṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ vā guṇebhyo muktiḥ ity apekṣāyāṃ vakṣyamāṇam artham ātma-rucy-utpattaye bhagavān stauti param iti dvābhyām paraṃ pūrvoktād anyaṃ prakṛti-jīvāntargatam eva guṇa-viṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ bhūyo vakṣyāmi yaj-jñānānāṃ prakṛti-jīva-viṣayakāṇām uttamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ navanītavad uddhṛtatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:63: ito loke param ātma-yāthātmyopalabdhi-lakṣaṇāṃ siddhiṃ gatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:64: yad vā jñāyate 'neneti jñānam upadeśam, tac ca prāg uktam api bhūyaḥ punar vidhāntareṇa vakṣyāmi
GE07bhg4c14u:67: yaj jñātvā sarve munaya ito lokāt parāṃ mokṣa-lakṣaṇāṃ siddhiṃ gatāḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c14u:69: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:70: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca ||2||
GE07bhg4c14u:73: jñāna-sādhanam anuṣṭhāya mama sādharmyaṃ mad-rūpatvaṃ prāptāḥ santaḥ sarge
GE07bhg4c14u:78: madhusūdanaḥ : tasyāḥ siddhair aikāntikatvaṃ darśayati idaṃ iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:79: idaṃ yathoktam jñānaṃ jñāna-sādhanam upāśrityānuṣṭhāya mama parameśvarasya
GE07bhg4c14u:80: sādharmyaṃ mad-rūpatām atyantābhedenāgatāḥ prāptāḥ santaḥ sarge 'pi
GE07bhg4c14u:83: vināśa-kāle na vyathanti ca vyathante na ca līyanta ity arthaḥ ||14.2||
GE07bhg4c14u:87: gurūpāsanayedaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam upāśritya prāpya janāḥ sarveśasya mama nityāvirbhūta-guṇāṣṭakasya sādharmyaṃ sādhanāvirbhāvitena tad-aṣṭakena sāmyam āgatāḥ santaḥ sarge nopajāyante sṛji-karmatāṃ nāpnuvanti pralaye na vyathante mṛti-karmatāṃ ca na yāntīti
GE07bhg4c14u:88: janma-mṛtyubhyāṃ rahitā muktā bhavantīti mokṣe jīva-bahutvam uktam |
GE07bhg4c14u:89: tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ ity ādi-śrutibhyaś caitad avagatam ||2||
GE07bhg4c14u:91: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham |
GE07bhg4c14u:93: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ praśaṃsayā śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtyedaṃ parameśvarādhīnayoḥ prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ prati hetutvaṃ na
GE07bhg4c14u:94: tu svatantrayor itīmaṃ vivakṣitam arthaṃ kathayati mameti |
GE07bhg4c14u:99: tan mahad brahma mama parameśvarasya yonir garbhādhāna-sthānam |
GE07bhg4c14u:107: madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ praśaṃśayā śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtya parameśvarādhīnayoḥ prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ prati hetutvaṃ na
GE07bhg4c14u:108: tu sāṅkhya-siddhāntavat svatantrayor itīmaṃ vivakṣitam artham āha mama
GE07bhg4c14u:113: avyākṛtaṃ prakṛtis triguṇātmkikā māyā mahad brahma |
GE07bhg4c14u:114: tac ca mameśvarasya yonir garbhādhāna-sthānaṃ tasmin mahati brahmaṇi yonau garbhaṃ sarva-bhūta-janma-kāraṇam ahaṃ bahu syāṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:118: kaścit pitā putram anuśayinaṃ vrīhy-ādy-āhāra-rūpeṇa svasmin līnaṃ śarīreṇa yojayituṃ yonau retaḥ-seka-pūrvakaṃ garbham ādhatte |
GE07bhg4c14u:119: tasmāc ca garbhādhānāt sa putraḥ śarīreṇa yujyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:120: tad arthaṃ ca madhye kalalādy-avasthā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c14u:121: tathā pralaye mayi līnam avidiyā-kāma-karmānuśayavantaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ sṛṣṭi-samaye
GE07bhg4c14u:124: | tad-arthaṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ bhavati he bhārata na tv
GE07bhg4c14u:127: bandha-hetutā-prakāraṃ vaktuṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñayoḥ sambhava-prakāram āha mama parameśvarasya yonir garbhādhāna-sthānaṃ mahad brahma deśa-kālānavacchinnatvāt mahat, bṛṃhaṇāt kārya-rūpeṇa vṛddher hetor brahma
GE07bhg4c14u:129: śrutāv api kvacit prakṛtir brahmeti nirdiśyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:131: itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parāṃ jīva-bhūtām ity anena cetana-puñja-rūpā yā jīva-prakṛtis
GE07bhg4c14u:133: | tato mat-kṛtāt garbhādhānāt sarva-bhūtānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ sambhava utpattiḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:134: baladevaḥ : tad evaṃ vaktavyārtha-stutyā tasmin ruciṃ śrotur utpādya bhūmir āpaḥ ity ādi-dvayārthānusārāt yāvat sañjāyate kiñcit ity ādau prakṛti-jīva-saṃyogaṃ pareśa-hetukam abhimatam iha sphuṭayati mameti |
GE07bhg4c14u:138: pradhāne brahma-śabdaś ca tasmād etad brahma nāma-rūpam annaṃ ca jāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:141: paramāṇu-caitanya-rāśim ahaṃ dadhāmy arpayāmi bhūmir āpaḥ ity ādinā yā jaḍā prakṛtir uktā
GE07bhg4c14u:143: itas tv anyām ity ādinā yā cetanā prakṛtir uktā seha sarva-prāṇi-bījatvād garbha-śabdeneti
GE07bhg4c14u:147: garbhādhānād vā sarva-bhūtānāṃ brahmādi-stambāntānāṃ sambhavo janir bhavati ||3||
GE07bhg4c14u:150: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bīja-pradaḥ pitā ||4||
GE07bhg4c14u:151: śrīdharaḥ : na kevalaṃ sṛṣṭy-upakrama eva mad-adhiṣṭhānenābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:154: sarvāsu yoniṣu manuṣyādyāsu yā mūrtayaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgamātmikā
GE07bhg4c14u:155: utpadyante tāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ mahad brahma prakṛtir yonir mātṛ-sthānīyā |
GE07bhg4c14u:156: ahaṃ ca bīja-pradaḥ pitā garbhādhāna-kartā pitā ||4||
GE07bhg4c14u:157: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu kathaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ tataḥ sambhavo devādi-deha-viśeṣāṇāṃ kāraṇāntara-sambhavād ity āśaṅkyāha sarva-yoniṣv iti
GE07bhg4c14u:158: | deva-pitṛ-manuṣya-paśu-mṛgādi-sarva-yoniṣu yā mūrtayo jarāyujāṇḍodbhijjādi-bhedena vilakṣaṇā vividha-saṃsthānās tanavaḥ saṃbhavanti he kaunteya! tāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ tat-tat-kāraṇa-bhāvāpannaṃ mahad brahmaiva yonir mātṛ-sthānīyā |
GE07bhg4c14u:159: ahaṃ parameśvaro bīja-prado garbhādhānasya kartā pitā |
GE07bhg4c14u:160: tena mahato brahmaṇa evāvasthā-viśeṣāḥ kāraṇāntarāṇīti yuktam uktaṃ sambhavaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ tato bhavati [Gītā 14.3] iti ||4||
GE07bhg4c14u:161: viśvanāthaḥ : na kevalaṃ sṛṣṭy-utpatti-samaya eva sarva-bhūtānāṃ prakṛtir mātā ahaṃ pitā api tu sarvadaivety āha sarvāsu yoniṣu devādyāsu stamba-paryantāsu yā mūrtayo jaṅgama-sthāvarātmikā utpadyante tāsāṃ mūrtīnāṃ mahad brahma prakṛtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:166: he kaunteya sarva-yoniṣu devādi-sthāvarāntāsu yoniṣu yā mūrtayas tanavaḥ sambhavanti tāsāṃ mahad brahma pradhānaṃ yonir
GE07bhg4c14u:171: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛti-saṃbhavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:174: sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ nirūpyedānīṃ prakṛti-saṃyogena puruṣasya saṃsāraṃ prapañcayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:176: sattvaṃ rajas tama ity evaṃ saṃjñakās trayo guṇāḥ prakṛti-sambhavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:177: prakṛteḥ sambhava udbhavo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:179: tasyāḥ sakāśāt pṛthaktveābhivyaktāḥ santaḥ prakṛti-kārye dehe tādātmyena sthitaṃ dehinaṃ cid-aṃśaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:184: idānīṃ kasmin guṇe saṅgaḥ ? ke vā guṇāḥ ? kathaṃ vā te badhnanti ? ity ucyate sattvam ity ādinānyam ity ataḥ prāk caturdaśabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:186: guṇā nitya-paratantrāḥ puruṣaṃ prati sarveṣām acetanānāṃ cetanārthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:188: na ca guṇa-guṇinor anyatvam atra vivakṣitam guṇa-trayātmakatvāt prakṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:189: tarhi kathaṃ prakṛti-sambhavāḥ ? ity ucyate - trayāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyāvasthā prakṛtir māyā bhagavats tasyāḥ sakāśāt parasparāṅgāṅgi-bhāvena vaiṣamyeṇa pariṇatāḥ prakṛti-sambhavā ity ucyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:191: śarīrendriya-saṃghāte dehinaṃ deha-tādātmyādhyāsāpannaṃ jīvaṃ paramārthataḥ sarva-vikāra-śūnyatvenāvyayaṃ nibadhnanti nirvikāram eva
GE07bhg4c14u:192: santaṃ sva-vikāravattayopadarśayantīva bhrāntyā jala-pātrāṇīva divi sthitam ādityaṃ pratibimbādhyāsena sva-kampādimattayā |
GE07bhg4c14u:193: yathā ca pāramarthiko bandho nāsti tathā vyākhyātaṃ prāk - śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate [Gītā 13.32] iti ||5||
GE07bhg4c14u:194: viśvanāthaḥ : tad eva prakṛti-puruṣābhyāṃ sarva-bhūtotpattiṃ nirūpeydānīṃ ke guṇā ucyante
GE07bhg4c14u:195: teṣu saṅgāt jīvasya kīdṛśo bandha ity apekṣāyām āha sattvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:196: dehe prakṛti-kārye tādātmyena sthitaṃ dehinaṃ jīvaṃ vastuto 'vyayaṃ nirvikāram asaṅginam apy anādy-avidyayā kṛtād guṇa-saṅgād eva hetor guṇā nibadhnanti ||5||
GE07bhg4c14u:197: baladevaḥ : atha ke guṇāḥ kathaṃ teṣu puruṣasya saṅgaḥ kathaṃ vā te taṃ nibadhnanti ity āha sattvam iti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:198: sattvādi-saṃjñakās trayo guṇāḥ prakṛti-sambhavāḥ prakṛter abhivyaktās te sva-kārye dehe sthitaṃ puruṣam
GE07bhg4c14u:199: avyayaṃ vastuto nirvikāram api nibadhnanty aviveka-gṛhītaiḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:204: śrīdharaḥ : tatra sattvasya bandhakatva-prakāraṃ cāha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c14u:205: tatra teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ madhye sattvaṃ nirmalatvāt svacchatvāt sphaṭika-maṇir iva prakāśakaṃ bhāsvaram anāmayaṃ ca nirupadravam |
GE07bhg4c14u:207: ataḥ śāntatvāt sva-kāryeṇa sukhena yaḥ saṅgas tena badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:208: prakāśakatvāc ca svakāryeṇa jñānena yaḥ saṅgas tena ca badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:209: he anagha niṣpāpa, ahaṃ sukhī jñānī ceti manodharmāṃs tad-abhimānini kṣetrajñe saṃyojayatīty arthaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c14u:210: madhusūdanaḥ : tatra ko guṇaḥ kena saṅgena badhnāti ? ity ucyate tatreti |
GE07bhg4c14u:211: tatra teṣu guṇeṣu madhye sattvaṃ prakāśakam caitanyasya
GE07bhg4c14u:215: āmayo duḥkhaṃ tad-virodhi sukhasyāpi vyañjakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:216: tad badhnāti sukha-saṅgena ca dehinaṃ ! he anagha avyasana ! sarvatra sambodhanānām abhiprāyaḥ prāg uktaḥ smartavyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:219: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ [Gītā 13.7] iti
GE07bhg4c14u:221: tatrāntaḥ-karaṇa-dharmasya sukhasya jñānasya cātmany adhyāsaḥ saṅgo 'haṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:226: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra sattvasya lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatva-prakāraṃ cāha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c14u:229: yaḥ saṅgaḥ prakāśakatvāt svakāryeṇa jñānena ca yaḥ saṅgaḥ ahaṃ sukhī jñānī cety upādhi-dharmayor avidyayaiva jīvasyābhimānas tena taṃ badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:230: he anagheti tvaṃ tu ahaṃ sukhī ahaṃ jñānīty abhimāna-lakṣaṇam aghaṃ mā svīkur
GE07bhg4c14u:232: baladevaḥ : atha sattvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāni bandhakatva-prakārāṃś cāha tatreti tribhiḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:233: tatra teṣu triṣu madhye prakāśakaṃ jñāna-vyañjakam
GE07bhg4c14u:238: tac ca sattvaṃ sva-kārye jñāne sukhe ca yaḥ saṃyogo jñāny ahaṃ sukhy aham ity abhimānas tena puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:241: tatra tatra saṅge sati tad-upāyeṣu karmasu pravṛttis tat-phalānubhavopāyeṣu
GE07bhg4c14u:243: punaś ca tatra tatra saṅga iti na sattvād vimuktiḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c14u:247: śrīdharaḥ : rajaso lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatvaṃ cāha raja iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:253: tayos tṛṣṇāsaṅgayoḥ samudbhavo yasmāt tad-rajo dehinaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu saṅgenāsaktyā nitarāṃ badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:254: tṛṣṇāsaṅgābhyāṃ hi karmasu āsaktir bhavatīty arthaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c14u:255: madhusūdanaḥ : rajyate viṣayeṣu puruṣo 'neneti rāgaḥ kāmo gardhaḥ sa evātmā svarūpaṃ yasya dharma-dharmitṇos tādātmyāt tad rāgātmakaṃ rajo viddhi |
GE07bhg4c14u:257: prāptasyopasthite 'pi vināśe saṃrakṣaṇābhilāṣa āsaṅgas tayos tṛṣṇāsaṅgayoḥ sambhavo yasmāt tad rajo
GE07bhg4c14u:259: he kaunteya ! karma-saṅgena karmasu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu aham
GE07bhg4c14u:260: ikdaṃ karomy etat phalaṃ bhokṣya ity abhiniveśa-viśeṣeṇa dehinaṃ vastuto 'kartāram eva kartṛtvābhimāninaṃ rajasaḥ pravṛtti-hetutvāt ||7||
GE07bhg4c14u:264: tayoḥ samudbhavo yasmāt tad rajaḥ dehinaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu saṅgenāsaktyā badhnāti tṛṣṇā-saṅgābhyāṃ karmasv āsaktir bhavati ||7||
GE07bhg4c14u:265: baladevaḥ : raja iti rāgaḥ strī-puruṣayor mitho 'bhilāsas tad-ātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:269: putra-mitrādi-saṃyogo 'bhilāṣaḥ saṅgas tayoḥ sambhavo yasmāt tat |
GE07bhg4c14u:271: tad rajaḥ strī-viṣaya-putrādi-prāpakeṣu karmasu saṅgenābhilāṣeṇa dehinaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:276: punar apy evam iti rajaso na vimuktiḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c14u:278: tamas tv ajñāna-jaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarva-dehinām |
GE07bhg4c14u:280: śrīdharaḥ : tamaso lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatvaṃ cāha tama iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:281: tamas tv ajñānāj jātam āvaraṇa-śakti-pradhānāt prakṛty-aṃśād udbhutaṃ viddhīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:283: ataeva pramādenālasyena nidrayā ca tat tamo dehinaṃ nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:290: ataḥ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ mohanam aviveka-rūpatvena bhrānti-janakam |
GE07bhg4c14u:291: pramādenālasyena nidrayā ca tat tamo nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:299: viśvanāthaḥ : ajñānam ajñānāt svīya-phalāt jātaṃ pratītam anumitaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:309: tasmāj jātaṃ tamo ætaḥ sarva-dehināṃ mohanaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:313: tat tamaḥ pramādādibhiḥ svakāryaiḥ puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:314: tatra pramādo 'navadhānam akārye karmaṇi pravṛtti-rūpaṃ sattva-kārya-prakāśa-virodhī |
GE07bhg4c14u:319: sattvaṃ sukhe saṃjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata |
GE07bhg4c14u:320: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde saṃjayaty uta ||9||
GE07bhg4c14u:321: śrīdharaḥ : sattvādīnām evaṃ sva-sva-kārya-karaṇe sāmarthyātiśayam āha sattvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:324: sabhāpi sukhābhimukham eva dehinaṃ karotiīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:326: saty api rajaḥ karmaṇy eva sañjayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:327: tamas tu mahat-saṅgena utpādyamānam api jñānam āvṛtyaācchādya pramāde sañjayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:331: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam evārthaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa punar darśayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:332: sattvaṃ kartṛ sukhe svīya-phale āsaktaṃ jīvaṃ sañjayati vaśīkaroti nibadhnātīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:333: rajaḥ kartṛ karmāṇi āsaktaṃ jīvaṃ badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:335: taṃ jñānam āvṛtya ajñānam utpādyety arthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c14u:336: baladevaḥ : guṇāḥ svāny advayotkṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ svakārye tanvantīty āha sattvam iti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c14u:337: sattvam utkṛṣṭaṃ sat sva-kārye sukhe puruṣaṃ sañjayaty āsaktaṃ karoti |
GE07bhg4c14u:338: rajo utkṛṣṭaṃ sat karmāṇi taṃ sañjayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:339: tama utkṛṣṭaṃ sat pramāde taṃ sañjayati jñānam āvṛtyācchādyājñānam utpādyety arthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c14u:341: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata |
GE07bhg4c14u:342: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:343: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha raja iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:348: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūyodbhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:350: evaṃ tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cobhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati
GE07bhg4c14u:351: | tataś ca sva-kārye pramādālasyādau sañjayatīty arthaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:352: madhusūdanaḥ : uktaṃ kāryaṃ kadā kurvanti guṇāḥ ? ity ucyate raja iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:353: rajas tamaś ca yugapad ubhāv api guṇāv abhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati udbhavati vardhate yadā, tadā sva-kāryaṃ prāg-uktam asādhāraṇyena karotīti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:354: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūyodbhavati yadā, tadā
GE07bhg4c14u:356: tathā tadvad eva tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cety ubhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati yadā, tadā sva-kāryam prāg-uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:358: viśvanāthaḥ : uktaṃ sva-sva-kāryaṃ sukhādikaṃ prati guṇāḥ kathaṃ prabhavantīty apekṣāyām āha rajas tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūya tiraskṛtya sattvaṃ bhavati adṛṣṭa-vaśād udbhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:359: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayābhibhūya tādṛśādṛṣṭa-vaśād udbhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:361: sattvaṃ rajaś cobhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:362: baladevaḥ : sameṣu triṣu katham akasmād ekasyotkarṣa iti cet
GE07bhg4c14u:363: prācīna-tādṛśa-karmodayāt tādṛśāhārāc ca svabhavatīti bhavavān āha raja
GE07bhg4c14u:365: sattvaṃ kartṛ rajas tamaś cābhibhūyo tiraskṛtyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:366: rajaḥ kartṛ sattvaṃ tamaś cābhibhūyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:367: tamaḥ kartṛ sattvaṃ rajaś cābhibhūyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:368: yadotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati, tadā pūrvoktam asādhāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ karotīti śeṣaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:371: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta ||11||
GE07bhg4c14u:372: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādīnāṃ vivṛddhānāṃ liṅgāny āha sarva-dvāreṣv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:373: asminn ātmano bhogāyatane dehe sarveṣv api dvāreṣu śrotrādiṣu yadā śabdādi-jñānātmakaḥ prakāśa upajāyate utpadyate tadānena prakāśaliṅgena sattvaṃ vivṛddhaṃ vidyāj jānīyāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:374: uta śabdāt sukhādi-liṅgenāpi jānīyād ity uktam ||11||
GE07bhg4c14u:375: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīm udbhūtānāṃ teṣāṃ liṅgāny āha tribhiḥ sarva-dvāreṣv
GE07bhg4c14u:377: asminn ātmano bhogāyatane dehe sarveṣv api dvāreṣūpalabdhi-sādhaneṣu
GE07bhg4c14u:379: sva-viṣayāvaraṇa-virodhī dīpavat, tad eva jñānaṃ śabdādi-viṣaya upajāyate tadānena śabdādi-viṣaya-jñānākhya-prakāśena liṅgena prakāśātmakaṃ sattvaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:382: viśvanāthaḥ : vardhamāno guṇa eva svāpekṣayā kṣīṇāv itarau guṇāv abhivaatīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c14u:383: atas teṣāṃ vṛddhi-liṅgāny āha sarveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:387: vaidika-śabdādi-yathārtha-jñānātmakaṃ tadā tādṛśa-jñāna-liṅgenaiva sattvaṃ vivṛddham iti jānīyāt
GE07bhg4c14u:389: baladevaḥ : utkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ liṅgāny āha sarveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:390: yadā sarveṣu jñāna-dvāreṣu śrotrādiṣu śabdādi-yāthātmya-prakāśa-rūpṃ jñānam upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:391: tadā tādṛśa-jñāna-liṅgenāsmin dehe sattvaṃ vivṛddhaṃ vidyāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:395: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā |
GE07bhg4c14u:398: lobho dhanādy-āgame jāyamāne 'pi punaḥ punar vardhamāno 'bhilāṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:401: aśama idaṃ kṛtvā idaṃ kariṣyāmi ity ādi saṅkalpa-vikalpānuparamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:402: spṛhā uccāvaceṣu dṛṣṭa-mātreṣu vastuṣu itas tato jighṛkṣā |
GE07bhg4c14u:403: rajasi vivṛddhe saty etāni liṅgāni jāyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:404: etais tamaso vivṛddhir jāānīyād ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c14u:405: madhusūdanaḥ : mahati dhanāgame jāyamāne 'py anukṣaṇaṃ vardhamānas tad-abhilāṣo lobhaḥ sva-viṣaya-prāpsya-nivartya icchā-viśeṣa iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c14u:411: spṛhoccāvaceṣu para-dhaneṣu dṛṣṭa-mātreṣu yena kenāpy upāyenopāditsā |
GE07bhg4c14u:412: rajasi rāgātmake vivṛddha etāni rāgātmakāni liṅgāni jāyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:413: he bharatarṣabha ! etair liṅgair vivṛddhaṃ rajo jānīyād ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c14u:414: viśvanāthaḥ : pravṛttir nānā prayatna-paratā karmaṇām ārambho gṛhādi-nirmāṇodyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:425: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:432: tamasi vivṛddhe saty etāni liṅgāni jāyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:433: etais tamaso vivṛddhiṃ jānīyād ity arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c14u:434: madhusūdanaḥ : aprakāśaḥ saty apy upadeśādau bodha-kāraṇe sarvathā bodhāyogyatvam |
GE07bhg4c14u:435: apravṛttiś ca saty apy agnihotraṃ juhuyād ity ādau pravṛtti-kāraṇaṃ janita-bodhe 'pi śāstre sarvathā tat-pravṛtty-ayogyatvam
GE07bhg4c14u:437: moha eva ca moho nidrā viparyayo vā |
GE07bhg4c14u:441: tamasy eva vivṛddha etāni liṅgāni jāyante he
GE07bhg4c14u:442: kuru-nandana ! ata etair liṅgair avayabhicāribhir vivṛddhaṃ tamo jānīyād ity arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c14u:451: pramādaḥ karādisthe 'py arthe nāstīti pratyayo moho mithyābhiniveśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:454: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti deha-bhṛt |
GE07bhg4c14u:456: śrīdharaḥ : maraṇa-samaya eva vivṛddhānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ phala-viśeṣam āha yadeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:457: sattva pravṛddhe sati yadā jīvo mṛtyuṃ prāpnoti tadā uttamān hiraṇyagarbhādīn vidanti upāsata ity uttama-vidaḥ teṣāṃ ye amalāḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:458: prakāśamayā lokāḥ sukhopabhoga-sthāna-viśeṣās tān pratipadyate prāpnoti
GE07bhg4c14u:459: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ maraṇa-samaye vivṛddhānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ phala-viśeṣam
GE07bhg4c14u:461: sattve pravṛddhe sati yadā pralayaṃ mṛtyuṃ yāti prāpnoti deha-bhṛd dehābhimānī jīvaḥ, tadottamā ye hiraṇyagarbhādayas
GE07bhg4c14u:465: tadā uttamaṃ vindanti labhanta ity uttama-vido hiraṇya-garbhādy-upāsakās teṣāṃ lokān amalān
GE07bhg4c14u:467: baladevaḥ : mṛti-kāle vivṛddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ phala-viśeṣān āha yad eti
GE07bhg4c14u:469: sattve pravṛddhe sati yadā deha-bhṛj jīvaḥ pralayaṃ yāti
GE07bhg4c14u:477: rajasi pravṛddhe sati mṛtyuṃ prāpya karmāsakteṣu manuṣyeṣu jāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:478: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe sati pralīno mṛto
GE07bhg4c14u:480: madhusūdanaḥ : rajasi pravṛddhe sati pralayaṃ mṛtyuṃ gatvā prāpya
GE07bhg4c14u:483: tathā tadvad eva tamasi pravṛddhe pralīno mṛto
GE07bhg4c14u:486: baladevaḥ : rajasi pravṛddhe pralayṃ maraṇaṃ gatvā janaḥ karma-saṅgiṣu
GE07bhg4c14u:488: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe pralīno mṛto jano mūḍha-yoniṣu paśv-ādiṣu ||15||
GE07bhg4c14u:491: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam ||16||
GE07bhg4c14u:494: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ sāttvikaṃ sattva-pradhānaṃ nirmalaṃ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalam āhuḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:496: rajasa iti rājasasya karmaṇa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:499: tamasa iti tāmasasya karmaṇa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:501: sāttvikādi-karma-lakṣaṇaṃ ca niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādinā aṣṭādaśe
GE07bhg4c14u:505: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇo dharmasya sāttvikaṃ sattvena nirvṛttaṃ nirmalaṃ rajas-tamo-malāmiśritaṃ sukhaṃ phalam āhuḥ paramarṣayau |
GE07bhg4c14u:507: puṇyasya phalaṃ rājasaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkha-bahulam alpaṃ sukhaṃ kāraṇānurūpyāt
GE07bhg4c14u:509: ajñānam aviveka-prāyaṃ duḥkhaṃ tāmasaṃ tamasas tāmasasya karmaṇo 'dharmasya phalam |
GE07bhg4c14u:511: sāttvikādi-karma-lakṣaṇaṃ ca niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādināṣṭādaśe vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c14u:513: abhedopacārāt gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram ity atra yathā go-śabdas
GE07bhg4c14u:514: tat-prabhave payasi, yathā vā dhānyam asi dhinuhi devān ity atra dhānya-śabdas tat-prabhave taṇḍule |
GE07bhg4c14u:515: tatra payas taṇḍulayor ivātrāpi karmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c14u:516: viśvanāthaḥ : sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ sāttvikam eva nirmalaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:519: baladevaḥ : atha guṇānāṃ svānurūpakarmadvārā vicitra-phala-hjetutvam āha karmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:520: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇo nirmalaṃ phalam āhur
GE07bhg4c14u:524: rajaso rājasasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ duḥkhaṃ kāryasya kāraṇānurūpyād duḥkha-pracuraṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:526: tamas tāmasasya karmaṇo hiṃsādeḥ phalam ajñāna-caitanya-prāyaṃ duḥkham evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:528: rājasa-tāmasa-karmaṇī lakṣye gobhiḥ prīṇita-matsaram ity atra yathā
GE07bhg4c14u:530: sāttvikādi-karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇāny aṣṭādaśe vakṣyante niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādibhiḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c14u:532: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:534: śrīdharaḥ : tatraiva hetum āha sattvād iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:536: ataḥ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:538: tasya ca duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo duḥkhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:540: tatas tāmasasya karmaṇo 'jñāna-prāpakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti yuktam evety arthaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c14u:541: madhusūdanaḥ : etādṛśa-phala-vaicitrye pūrvoktam eva hetum āha sattvād iti
GE07bhg4c14u:544: tad-anurūpaṃ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:547: tasya ca nirantaram upacīyamānasya pūrayitum aśakyasya sarvadā
GE07bhg4c14u:548: duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya rājasasya karmaṇo duḥkhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:549: evaṃ pramāda-mohau tamasaḥ sakāśād bhavato jāyete |
GE07bhg4c14u:552: atas tāmasasya karmaṇas tāmasam ajñānādi-prāyam eva phalaṃ bhavatīti yuktam evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:554: pramādo mohaś cāprakāśo 'pravṛttiś cety atra vyākhyātau ||17||
GE07bhg4c14u:556: baladevaḥ : īdṛk-phala-vaicitrye prāg uktam eva hetum āha sattvād iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:560: rajaso lobhas tṛṣṇā-viśeṣo yo viṣayakoṭibhir apy abhisevitair duṣpūras tasya ca duḥkha-hetutvāt
GE07bhg4c14u:561: tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo duḥkha-pracuraṃ kiñcit sukhaṃ phalam |
GE07bhg4c14u:562: tamasas tu pramādādīni bhavanty atas tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo 'caitanya-pracuraṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:565: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:567: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādi-vṛtti-śīlānāṃ phala-bhedam āha ūrdhvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:577: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādi-vṛtta-sthānāṃ prāg-uktam eva phalam ūrdhva-madhyādho-bhāvenāha ūrdhvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:579: vṛtta-śabda-yogād ādyayor api vṛttam eva vivakṣitam |
GE07bhg4c14u:580: tena sattvasthāḥ sattva-vṛtte śāstrīye jñāne karmaṇi ca niratā ūrdhvaṃ satya-loka-paryantaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:582: tathā madhye manuṣya-loke puṇya-pāpa-miśre tiṣṭhanti na tūrdhvaṃ gacchanty adho vā manuṣyeṣūtpadyante rājasā rajo-guṇa-vṛtte lobhādi-pūrvake rājase karmaṇi niratāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:584: paścād-bhāvino nikṛṣṭasya tamaso guṇasya vṛtte nidrālasyādau sthitā adho gacchanti paścādiṣūtpadyante
GE07bhg4c14u:585: kadācij jaghanya-guṇa-vṛtta-sthāḥ sāttvikā rājasāś ca bhavanty ata āha tāmasāḥ sarvadā tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:586: itareṣāṃ kadācit tad-vṛtta-sthatve 'pi na tat-pradhānateti bhāvaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c14u:589: jaghanyaś cāsau guṇaś ceti tasya vṛttiḥ pramādālasyādis tatra sthitā adho gacchanti narakaṃ yānti ||18||
GE07bhg4c14u:590: baladevaḥ : atha sattvādi-vṛtti-niṣṭhānāṃ tāny eva phalāny
GE07bhg4c14u:592: tamasi vṛtti-śabdād itarayoś ca vṛttir vivakṣitā |
GE07bhg4c14u:599: nikṛṣṭo yo guṇas tamaḥ-saṃjñas tad-vṛttau pramādādau sthitās tv adho gacchanti tamas-tāratamyena paśu-pakṣi-sthāvarādi-yoniṃ labhante |
GE07bhg4c14u:600: tāmasā ity uktis teṣāṃ sarvadā tamasi sthitiṃ vyanakti ||18||
GE07bhg4c14u:603: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti mad-bhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati ||19||
GE07bhg4c14u:604: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ prakṛti-guṇa-saṅga-kṛtaṃ saṃsāra-prapañcam uktvā idānīṃ tad-vivekato mokṣaṃ darśayati nānyam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:605: yadā tu draṣṭā vivekī bhūtvā buddhyādyākāra-pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ nānupaśyati
GE07bhg4c14u:606: api tu guṇa eva karmāṇi kurvantīti paśyati |
GE07bhg4c14u:607: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vyatiriktaṃ tat-sākṣiṇam ātmānaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c14u:608: sa tu mad-bhāvaṃ brahmatvam adhigacchati prāpnoti ||19||
GE07bhg4c14u:609: madhusūdanaḥ : asminn adhyāye vaktavyatvena prastutam artha-trayam |
GE07bhg4c14u:611: kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogasyeśvarādhīnatvaṃ ke vā guṇāḥ kathaṃ vā te
GE07bhg4c14u:613: adhunā tu guṇebhyaḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ muktasya ca kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti vaktavyam avaśiṣyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:615: mithyā-jñānātmakatvād guṇānāṃ samyag-jñānāt tebhyo mokṣaṇam ity āha nānyam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:616: guṇebhyaḥ kārya-kāraṇa-viṣayākāra-pariṇatebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭā vicāra-kuśalaḥ sann anupaśyati vicāram anu na paśyati guṇā
GE07bhg4c14u:619: guṇebhyaś ca tat-tad-avasthā-viśeṣeṇa pariṇatebhyaḥ paraṃ guṇa-tat-kāryāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ tad-bhāsakam ādityam iva jala-tat-kampādy-asaṃspṛṣṭaṃ nirvikāraṃ sarva-sākṣiṇaṃ sarvatra samaṃ kṣetrajñam ekaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c14u:621: vīśvāṇaṭḥaḥ : guṇa-kṛtaṃ saṃsāraṃ darśayitvā guṇātītaṃ mokṣaṃ darśayati nānyam iti dvābhyām
GE07bhg4c14u:623: 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ draṣṭā jīvo yadā nānupaśyati, kintu guṇā eva sadaiva kartāra ity evam anupaśyati anubhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:624: guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ vyatirikam evātmānaṃ vetti tadā sa draṣṭā mad-bhāvaṃ mayi sāyujyam adhigacchati prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c14u:625: tatra tādṛśa-jñānānantaram api mayi parāṃ bhaktiṃ kṛtvaiva ity upānta-ślokārtha-dṛṣṭyā jñeyam
GE07bhg4c14u:626: baladevaḥ : evaṃ guṇa-vivekāt saṃsāram uktvā tad-vivekān mokṣam āha nānyam
GE07bhg4c14u:629: pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ nānupaśyati guṇān kartĪn paśyaty ātmānaṃ guṇebhyaḥ parama-kartāraṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c14u:631: | ayam āśayaḥ -- na khalu vijñānānando viśuddho jīvo yuddha-yajñādi-duḥkhamaya-karmaṇāṃ kartā, kintu guṇamaya-dehendriyavān eva saṃstatheti guṇa-hetukatvād guṇa-niṣṭhaṃ tat-karma-kartṛtvaṃ na tu viśuddhātma-niṣṭham iti yadānupaśyati, tadā mad-bhāvam asaṃsāritvaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:635: kartṛtvaṃ śuddhasya niṣiddhaṃ, na tu śuddha-niṣṭham iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:638: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī deha-samudbhavān |
GE07bhg4c14u:640: śrīdharaḥ : tataś ca guṇa-kṛta-sarvānartha-nivṛttyā kṛtārtho bhavatīty āha
GE07bhg4c14u:642: dehādyākāraḥ samudbhavaḥ pariṇāmo yeṣāṃ te deha-samudbhavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:643: tān etāṃ trīn api guṇān atītyātikramya tat-kṛtair janmādibhir vimuktaḥ sann amṛtam aśnute paramānandaṃ prāpnoti ||20||
GE07bhg4c14u:644: madhusūdanaḥ : katham adhigacchatīty ucyate - guṇān iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:645: guṇān etān māyātmakās trīn sattva-rajas-tamo-nāmno deha-samudbhavān
GE07bhg4c14u:646: dehotpatti-bīja-bhūtān atītya jīvann eva tattva-jñānena bādhitvā
GE07bhg4c14u:647: janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhair janmanā mṛtyunā jarayā duḥkhaiś cādhyātmikādibhir māyā-mayair vimukto jīvann eva tat-sambandha-śūnyaḥ san vidvān amṛtaṃ mokṣam aśnute prāpnoti ||20||
GE07bhg4c14u:648: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca so 'pi guṇātīta evocyata ity āha guṇān iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c14u:649: baladevaḥ : mad-bhāva-padenoktam arthaṃ sphuṭayati guṇān iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:652: dehotpādaāṃs trīn guṇān atītyollaṅghya janmādibhir vimukto 'mṛtam ātmānam aśnute 'nubhavati
GE07bhg4c14u:658: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho |
GE07bhg4c14u:659: kim-ācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:660: śrīdharaḥ : guṇān etān atītyāmṛtam aśnuta ity etat śrutvā guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:661: he prabho kair liṅgaiḥ kīdṛśair ātma-vyutpannaiś cihnair guṇātīto dehī
GE07bhg4c14u:665: kathaṃ ca kenopāyena etāṃs trīn api guṇān atītya vartate |
GE07bhg4c14u:667: madhusūdanaḥ : guṇān etān atītya jīvann evāmṛtam aśnuta ity etac chrutvā
GE07bhg4c14u:668: guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam cācāraṃ ca guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:669: etān guṇān atīto yaḥ sa kair liṅgair viśiṣṭo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:670: yair liṅgaiḥ sa jñātuṃ śakyas tāni me brūhīty ekaḥ praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:672: bhṛtya-duḥkhaṃ bhagavataiva nivāraṇīyam iti sūcayan sambodhayati prabho
GE07bhg4c14u:677: kathaṃ vā kena ca prakāreṇaitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate 'tikrāmatīti guṇātītatvopāyaḥ ka iti tṛtīyaḥ praśnaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:678: viśvanāthaḥ : sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā dvitīyādhyāye pṛṣṭam apy arthaṃ punas tato 'pi viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchati kair liṅgaiḥ ity ekaḥ praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:679: kaiś cihnais triguṇātītaḥ sa jñeya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:683: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādau sthita-prajño guṇātītaḥ kathaṃ syād iti tadānīṃ na pṛṣṭam idānīṃ tu pṛṣṭam iti viśeṣaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:684: baladevaḥ : guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ ca guṇātyaya-sādhanaṃ cārjunaḥ pṛcchati kair ity ardhakena
GE07bhg4c14u:685: prathamaḥ praśnaḥ kaiś cihnair guṇātīto jñātuṃ śakya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:686: kim ācāra iti dvitīyaḥ sa kiṃ yatheṣṭācāro niyatācāro vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:687: kathaṃ caitān iti tṛtīyaḥ kena sādhanena guṇān atyetīty arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:689: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava |
GE07bhg4c14u:690: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati ||22||
GE07bhg4c14u:691: śrīdharaḥ : sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā dvitīye
GE07bhg4c14u:692: 'dhyāye pṛṣṭam api dattottaram api punar viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchatīti jñātvā prakārāntareṇa tasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ cety
GE07bhg4c14u:695: prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'sminn iti pūrvoktaṃ sattva-kāryam |
GE07bhg4c14u:699: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni santi duḥkha-buddhyā
GE07bhg4c14u:701: nivṛttāni ca santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati, guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti caturthenānvayaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:702: madhusūdanaḥ : sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā pṛṣṭam api prajahāti yadā kāmān [Gītā 2.55] ity ādinā dattottaram api punaḥ prakārāntareṇa bubhūtsamānaḥ pṛcchatīty avadhāya prakārāntareṇa tasya
GE07bhg4c14u:703: lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:704: yas tāvat kair liṅgair yukto guṇātīto bhavatīti praśnas tasyottaraṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c14u:709: sarvāṇy api guṇa-kāryāṇi yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni sva-sāmagrī-vaśād udbhūtāni santi duḥkha-rūpāṇy
GE07bhg4c14u:711: tathā vināśa-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni tāni sukha-rūpāṇy api santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati na kāmayate svapnavan
GE07bhg4c14u:713: etādṛśa-dveṣa-rāga-śūnyo yaḥ sa guṇātīta ucyata iti caturtha-śloka-gatenānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:714: idaṃ ca svātma-pratyakṣaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ svārtham eva na parārtham |
GE07bhg4c14u:715: na hi svāśritau dveṣa-tad-abhāvau rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paraḥ pratyetum arhati ||22||
GE07bhg4c14u:716: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra kair liṅgair guṇātīto bhavatīti prathama-praśnasyottaram āha prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'smin prakāśa upajāyate iti sattva-kāryam |
GE07bhg4c14u:720: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c14u:722: etāni nivṛttāni ca sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati, sa guṇātīta ucyate iti caturthenānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:724: baladevaḥ : yadyapi sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā pṛṣṭam idaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:725: prajahāti yadā kāmān ity ādinottaritaṃ ca, tathāpi viśeṣa-jijñāsayā
GE07bhg4c14u:726: pṛcchatīti vidhāntareṇa tasya lakṣāṇādīny āha bhagavān prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:727: tatraikena lakṣaṇaṃ sva-saṃvedyam āha prakāśaṃ sattva-kāryaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:728: pravṛttiṃ rajaḥ-kāryaṃ mohaṃ tamaḥ-kāryaṃ etāni trīṇi sampravṛttāny
GE07bhg4c14u:729: utpādaka-sāmagrī-vaśāt prāptāni duḥkha-rūpāṇy api duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi, vināśaka-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni vinaṣṭāni tāni sukha-rūpāny api
GE07bhg4c14u:730: sukha-buddhyā yo nākāṅkṣati, etādṛśa-dveṣa-rāga-śūnyo guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate
GE07bhg4c14u:732: svagatau dveṣa-tad-abhāvau rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paro na veditum arhatīti sva-saṃvedyam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ||22||
GE07bhg4c14u:734: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:735: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate ||23||
GE07bhg4c14u:736: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ sva-saṃvedyaṃ guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam uktvā
GE07bhg4c14u:737: para-saṃvedyaṃ tasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ dvitīya-praśnasya kim ācāra ity
GE07bhg4c14u:739: udāsīnavat sākṣitayāsīnaḥ sthitaḥ san guṇair guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir na yo vicālyate svarūpān na pracyavate api tu guṇā eva svakāryeṣu vartante |
GE07bhg4c14u:740: etair mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tuṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c14u:744: viśvanāthaḥ : kim ācāraḥ iti dvitīya-praśnasyottaram āha udāsīnavad iti
GE07bhg4c14u:746: guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir yo na vicālyate svarūpāvasthān na cyavate, api tu guṇa eva sva-sva-kāryeṣu vartanta ity eveti ebhir mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati parasmaipadam ārṣam |
GE07bhg4c14u:748: guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti guṇātītasya etāni cihnāni etān ācārāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaiva guṇātīto vaktavyo na tu guṇātītatvopapatti-vāvadūko guṇātīto vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ ||23-25||
GE07bhg4c14u:749: baladevaḥ : atha para-saṃvedya-lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ kim ācāraḥ iti
GE07bhg4c14u:751: udāsīno madhyastho yathā vivādinoḥ pakṣagrahaiḥ sva-mādhyasthyān na vicālyate, tayā
GE07bhg4c14u:752: sukha-duḥkhādi-bhāvena parṇatair guṇair yo nātmāvasthitair vicālyate,
GE07bhg4c14u:754: mama tair na sambandha iti niścitya tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhate |
GE07bhg4c14u:766: tulyo nindā cātmanaḥ saṃstutiś ca yasya ||24||
GE07bhg4c14u:770: kasmād evaṃ yasmāt svasthaḥ svasminn ātmany eva sthito dvaita-darśana-śūnyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:774: ata eva tulye priyāpriye sukha-duḥkha-sādhane yasya
GE07bhg4c14u:779: yasya sa guṇātīta ucyata iti dvitīya-gatenānvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c14u:783: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥṅ same anātma-dharmatvāt tulye sukha-duḥkhe yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:784: samāny anupādeyatayā tulyāni losṭrādīni yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:791: ya īdṛśo guṇatītaḥ sa ucyata iti dvitīyenānvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c14u:799: sarvān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthān ārambhān udyamān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:805: śabda-rūpe mānāpamānau tu śabdam antareṇāpi kāya-mano-vyāpāra-viśeṣāv iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:806: atra pa-kāra-va-kārayoḥ pāṭha-vikalpe 'py arthaḥ sa eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:812: ārabhyanta ity ārambhāḥ karmāṇi tān sarvān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c14u:814: udāsīnavad āsīna ity ādy-ukta-prakārācāro guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:815: yad uktam upekṣakatvādi tad-vidyodayāt pūrvaṃ yatna-sādhyaṃ vidyādhikāriṇā sādhanatvenānuṣṭheyam utpannāyāṃ tu vidyāyāṃ jīvan-muktasya
GE07bhg4c14u:816: guṇātītasyoktaṃ dharma-jātam ayatna-siddhaṃ lakṣaṇatvena tiṣṭhaty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:820: mānāpamānau tu kāyamanovyāpāreṇāpi syātām iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:823: ya īdṛśo guṇātītaḥ undāsīnavat ity ādy uktā yasyācārḥ parair api saṃvedyāḥ sa guṇātīto bodhyo na tu tad-upapatti-vāvadūka iti bhāvaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c14u:827: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:830: mām eva parameśvaram avyabhicāreṇa ekāntena bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa etān guṇān samatītya
GE07bhg4c14u:831: samyag atikramya brahma-bhūyāya brahma-bhāvāya mokṣāya kalpate samartho
GE07bhg4c14u:833: madhusūdanaḥ : adhunā katham etān guṇān ativartata iti tṛtīya-praśnasya
GE07bhg4c14u:839: dvādaśādhyāyoktena yaḥ sevate sadā cintayati sa mad-bhakta etān prāg-uktān
GE07bhg4c14u:844: viśvanāthaḥ : kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti
GE07bhg4c14u:847: mām eva śyāmasundarākāraṃ parameśvaraṃ bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa eva
GE07bhg4c14u:848: brahma-bhūyāya brahmatvāya brahmānubhavāya yāvat bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:849: iti mad-vākye ekayeti viśeṣaṇopanyāsāt mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te ity atrāpi eva-kāra-prayogāt bhaktyā vinā prakārāntareṇa
GE07bhg4c14u:853: jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset iti jñānināṃ carama-daśāyāṃ jñānasyāpi
GE07bhg4c14u:855: bhakti-yogasya tu kvāpi nyāsāśravaṇāt bhakti-yoga eva so 'vyabhicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:856: tena karma-yogam iva jñāna-yogam api parityājya yady
GE07bhg4c14u:857: avyabhicāreṇa kevalenaiva bhaktiyogena sevate, tarhi jñānī api guṇātīto
GE07bhg4c14u:859: ananya-bhaktas tu nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ ity ekādaśokter guṇātīto bhavaty eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:860: atra idaṃ tattvaṃ VEṛṣE ity atrāsaṅginaḥ karmiṇo jñānino vā sāttvikatvenaiva sādhakatvāvagates
GE07bhg4c14u:861: tat-sāhacaryāt nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ iti bhaktaḥ sādhaka evāvagamyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:862: tataś ca jñānī jñāna-siddhaḥ sann eva sāttvikatvaṃ parityajya guṇātīto bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:863: bhaktas tu sādhaka-daśām ārabhyaiva guṇātīto bhavatīty artho labhyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:865: mām eveśvaraṃ nārāyaṇam avyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena dvādaśādyāyoktena yaḥ sevata iti
GE07bhg4c14u:867: baladevaḥ : kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartata iti
GE07bhg4c14u:870: nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ karāram ity ādy-uktyā yo guṇa-puruṣa-viveka-khyātim avāpa tayaiva tasyā
GE07bhg4c14u:871: guṇātyayo na saṃsidhyati, kintu tadvān api yo māṃ kṛṣṇam eva
GE07bhg4c14u:874: bhakti-yogena sevate śrayati sa etān duratyayān api guṇān atītyākramya brahma-bhūyāya kalpate guṇāṣṭa-viśiṣṭatvāya[*ENDNOTE] nija-dharmāya yogyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:876: jīve brahma-śabdas tūkta eva prk, tathā ca bhakti-śiraskayaiva tad-viveka-khyātyā jīvasya
GE07bhg4c14u:877: svarūpa-lābho, na tu kevalayā tayety uktam |
GE07bhg4c14u:878: yat tu brahma-bhūyāya ity anena mad-rūpatāṃ sa yātīti pārtha-sārathinopadiṣṭam iti vyācaṣṭe
GE07bhg4c14u:879: tan-niravadhānam eva tenaivedaṃ jñānam ity ādinā mokṣe 'pi |
GE07bhg4c14u:880: svarūpa-bhedasyābhihitatvāt nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti ity ādi
GE07bhg4c14u:881: śrutiṣv api tatra tasya dṛṣṭatvād aṇutva-vibhutvādi-nitya-dharma-kṛtatvena
GE07bhg4c14u:882: nityatvāc ca tad-bhedasya tasmād guṇāṣṭaka-viśiṣṭatvam eva brahaiva san
GE07bhg4c14u:883: brahmāpy eti iti śrutyau tu brahma-sadṛśaḥ san bramāpy eti prāpnotīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:885: vavā yathā tathaivevaṃ sāmye ity amara-koṣāc ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:890: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha brahmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:894: yathā ghanībhūtaḥ prakāśa eva sūrya-maṇḍalaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:902: mad-bhāvasyāvaśyambhāvitvād yuktam evoktaṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti ||
GE07bhg4c14u:904: sukhaṃ tarati mad-bhakta ity abhāṣi caturdaśe ||
GE07bhg4c14u:907: madhusūdanaḥ : atra hetum āha brahmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:909: sopādhikasya jagad-utpatti-sthiti-laya-hetoḥ pratiṣṭhā pāramārthikaṃ nirvikalpalpakaṃ sac-cid-ānandātmakaṃ nirupādhikaṃ tat-pada-lakṣyam ahaṃ nivikalpako vāsudevaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty atreti pratiṣṭhā kalpita-rūpa-rahitam
GE07bhg4c14u:911: ato yo mām upādhikaṃ brahma sevate sa brahma-bhūyāya
GE07bhg4c14u:913: kīdṛśasya brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāham ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇāni amṛtasya
GE07bhg4c14u:917: sukhasya viṣayendriya-saṃyogajatvaṃ vārayati aikāntikasyāvyabhicāriṇaḥ sarvasmin deśe kāle ca vidyamānasyaikāntika-sukha-rūpasyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:918: etādṛśasya brahmaṇo yasmād ahaṃ vāstavaṃ svarūpaṃ tasmān mad-bhaktaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:922: ekas tvam ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ satyaḥ svayaṃ jyotir ananta ādyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:923: nityo 'kṣaro 'jasra-sukho nirañjanaḥ pūrṇo 'dvayo mukta upādhito 'mṛtaḥ || [10.14.23] iti
GE07bhg4c14u:924: atra sarvopādhi-śūnya ātmā brahma tvam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:926: sarveṣām api vastūnāṃ bhāvārtho bhavati sthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:927: tasyāpi bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ kim atad vastu rūpyatām || [BhP 10.14.57] iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:928: sarveṣām eva kārya-vastūnāṃ bhāvārthaḥ sattā-rūpaḥ paramārtho bhavati kāryākāreṇa jāyamāne sopādhike brahmaṇi sthitaḥ kāraṇa-sattātiriktāyāḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:930: tasyāpi bhavataḥ kāraṇasya sopādhikasya brahmaṇo bhāvārthaḥ sattā-rūpo 'rtho bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:931: nirupādhike kalpitatvāt kalpitasya cādhiṣṭhānān atirekāt, bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya ca sarva-kalpanādhiṣṭhānatvena
GE07bhg4c14u:934: chrī-kṛṣṇād anyad vastu paramārthikaṃ kiṃ nirūpyatāṃ tad evaikaṃ paramārthikaṃ nānyat kim apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:935: tad etad ihāpy uktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:936: athavā tvad-bhaktas tvad-bhāvam āpnotu nāma kathaṃ nu brahma-bhāvāya
GE07bhg4c14u:937: kalpyate brahmaṇaḥ sakāśāt tavānyatvād ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:938: brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ pratiṣṭhā paryāptir aham eva na tu mad-bhinnaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:940: tathāmṛtasya amṛtatvasya mokṣasya cāvyayasya sarvathānucchedyasya ca ca pratiṣṭhāham eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:944: dharmasya jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇasya ca paryāptir aham eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:945: jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇo dharmo mayy eva paryavasito na tena mad-bhinnaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:947: tathaikāntikasya sukhasya ca paryāptir aham eva parmānanda-rūpatvān na mad-bhinnaṃ kiṃcit sukhaṃ prāpyam astīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:948: tasmād yuktam evoktaṃ mad-bhakto brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti ||27||
GE07bhg4c14u:954: viśvanāthaḥ : nanu mad-bhaktānāṃ kathaṃ nirguṇa-brahmatva-prāptiḥ ? sā tu advitīya-tad-ekānubhavenaiva sambhavet |
GE07bhg4c14u:956: hi yasmāt parama-pratiṣṭhātvena prasiddhaṃ yad brahma tasyāpy ahaṃ pratiṣṭhā
GE07bhg4c14u:957: pratiṣṭhīyate 'sminn iti pratiṣṭhā āśrayo 'nna-mayādiṣu śrutiṣu sarvatraiva pratiṣṭhā-padasya tathārthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:961: tathā śāśvatasya dharmasya sādhana-phala-daśayor api nitya-sthitasya
GE07bhg4c14u:964: | ataḥ sarvasyāpi mad-adhīnatvāt kaivalya-kāmanayā kṛtena mad-bhajanena
GE07bhg4c14u:966: atra brahmaṇo 'haṃ pratiṣṭhā ghanībhūtaṃ brahmaivāhaṃ yathā
GE07bhg4c14u:967: ghanībhūta-prakāśa eva sūrya-maṇḍalaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ iti svāmi-caraṇāḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:968: | sūryasya tejo-rūpatve 'pi yathā tejasa āśrayatvam apy ucyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:969: evaṃ me kṛṣṇasya brahma-rūpatve 'pi brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhātvam api |
GE07bhg4c14u:971: śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇam api pramāṇam -- śubhāśrayaḥ sa cittasya sarvagasya tathātmanaḥ [ViP 6.7.76] iti vyākhyātaṃ ca tatrāpi svāmi-caraṇaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:973: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:976: prakṛtau puruṣe caiva brahmaṇy api sa prabhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:977: yathaika eva puruṣo vāsudevo vyavasthitaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:979: yathācyutas tvaṃ parataḥ parasmāt sa brahma-bhūtāt parataḥ parātmā |
GE07bhg4c14u:981: tathā hari-vaṃśe 'pi vipra-kumārānayana-prasaṅge arjunaṃ prati śrī-bhagavad-vākyaṃ --
GE07bhg4c14u:982: tat-paraṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaṃ vibhajate jagat |
GE07bhg4c14u:983: mamaiva tad ghanaṃ tejo jñātum arhasi bhārata || (HV 2.114.11-12)
GE07bhg4c14u:988: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi || iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:991: vetsyasy anugṛhītaṃ me sampraśnair vivṛtaṃ hṛdi || iti bhagavad-uktiś ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:992: madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāś ca vyācakṣate sma yathā -- nanu tvad-bhaktas
GE07bhg4c14u:993: tvad-bhāvam āpnotu nāma kathaṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpate brahmaṇaḥ sakāśāt
GE07bhg4c14u:1000: vande nandātmajaṃ mahaḥ || ity upaślokayāmāsuś ca ||27||
GE07bhg4c14u:1002: tac ca bhaktyaiva bhavatīty adhyāyārtho nirūpitaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c14u:1005: baladevaḥ : nanu tad-viveka-khyātyā tvad-eka-bhaktyā ca guṇātīto labdha-svarūpo brahma-śabdito muktaḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhed iti cet tatrāha
GE07bhg4c14u:1008: brahmaṇas tat-pūrvakayā tayā sattvādyāvaraṇātyayād āvirbhāvita-svaguṇāṣṭakasyāmṛtasya mṛitir nirgatasyāvyayasya tādrūpyaṇaikarasasya muktasya mad-atipriyasyāham eva
GE07bhg4c14u:1010: pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhīyate 'tra iti nirukteḥ paramāśrayo 'tipriyo bhavāmīti tādṛśaṃ māṃ parayā bhaktyānubhavaṃs tiṣṭhatīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:1011: na matto viśleṣa-leśo na ca punar āvartate, yad gatvā na nivartante muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ iti smṛtibhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:1012: nanu muktas tvāṃ kathaṃ śrayeta śravaṇa-phalasya mukter lābhād iti ced asty atiśayitaṃ phalam iti bhāvenāha śāśvatasya sādhāraṇasya sukhasya ca
GE07bhg4c14u:1014: tīvrānanda-rūpa-tad-vibhūti-mal-līlānubhavāya mām eva samāśrayatīty evam āha śrutiḥ raso vai saḥ, rasaṃ hy evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati [TaittU
GE07bhg4c14u:1016: saṃsāro guṇa-yogaḥ syād vimokṣas tu guṇātyayaḥ |
